alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior York; Kennebec; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 4:07PM EST until November 30 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Patchy freezing drizzle expected. Little or no ice accumulation expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest, and western Maine. Portions of central and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Although ice amounts will be light, the freezing drizzle is expected to fall on cold bare pavement. This will lead to the potential for glaze ice formation on untreated roads, leading to extremely dangerous travel conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the early Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
